mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prices (id, price, registration_date, manager_id, product_id, activation) VALUES (UUID(), #{price}, curdate(), #{manager_id}, #{product_id}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.price, p.registration_date, p.manager_id, p.product_id, p.activation, p.manager_id, p.activation, pro.name as product_name, a.name as account_name FROM prices as p left join product as pro on p.product_id = pro.id left join account as a on p.manager_id = a.id WHERE p.activation != 0 ORDER BY p.registration_date limit #{start} , #{count};
